message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be invaluable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I assure you this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $2000000.  This is a substantial discount from its true value, and I'm confident it will generate significant returns for your investment. Please let me know your thoughts.
